title: DVD A Tribute to Edith Piaf - Live at Montreux 2004 (DVD9)
description:
*** A Tribute to Edith Piaf - Live at Montreux 2004 ***

Six artists, accompanied by a jazz quartet led by pianist 
Baptiste Trotignon, paid homage to Edith Piaf. Angelique
Kidjo, from Benin, and the Swiss Michael von der Heide,
reminded us of her importance in the French speaking world.
Catherine Ringer and Regine highlight how much she played
with musical types and styles. Ute Lemper proved, once 
again, the universality of this friend of Marlene Dietrich. 
And Barbara Morrison, great American voice, suggests that
the little lady in black incarnated a sspecial sentiment 
'a la francaise'.

- tracklist -

01. Padam, Padam (Baptiste Trotignon & musicians)
02. Sous Le Ciel De Paris (Baptiste Trotignon & musicians)
03. Mon Dieu (Michael von der Heide)
04. Amants D'Un Jour (Michael von der Heide)
05. Elle Frequentait La Rue Pigalle (Ute Lemper)
06. Embrasse-Moi (Ute Lemper)
07. L'Accordeoniste (Ute Lemper)
08. Padam, Padam (Regine)
09. Mon Manege A Moi (Regine)
10. Autumn Leaves (Barbara Morrison)
11. C'est a Hambourg (Catherine Ringer)
12. La Fille Et La Chien (Catherine Ringer)
13. La Goualante Du Pauvre Jean (Catherine Ringer)
14. Johnny, Tu N'es Pas Un Ange (Angelique Kidjo)
15. Non, Je Ne Regrette Rien (Angelique Kidjo)
16. La Foule (Angelique Kidjo)
17. La Vie En Rose (All Artists)

- specs -

DVD 9 - PCM Stereo, Dolby Surround 5.1 & DTS Digital Surround 
Sound - 16:9 Screen Format - Running Time 79 min. approx. -
c 2007 Eagle Rock Entertainment - COVER & LABEL INCLUDED
